description:
Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Ryuji, but Ryuji has one more rule to mention:  All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board.  With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi’s position is helpless!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le duel des monstres des dés - 3e partie
Yugi`s Difficult Battle: Orgoth the Relentless`s Fierce Attack
Yuugi Kusen God Orguss no Moukou
遊戯苦戦 ゴッドオーガスの猛攻
